item.title: How to get your first interviews as a software engineer
item.description: Finding a job is never easy - finding the first job is a thousand times harder. Getting those automatic rejection emails without having a chance to interview can be an emotional roller-coaster that makes you doubt your skills, abilities, and intentions. This is why striving for visibility is key when trying to land that first job interview. The greater the number of people who view your resume, the greater the chance of being offered an interview - it’s as simple as that.
